sentence.Network_en: Depression is the third thing that works to my patients' disadvantage.
sentence.Network_cn: 抑郁是威胁我的病人健康的第三大杀手。

sentence.Network_en: Her ignorance of the area put her at a decided disadvantage.
sentence.Network_cn: 她对该地区一无所知，这显然对她不利。

sentence.Network_en: A snap election would be to their disadvantage.
sentence.Network_cn: 提前选举将对他们不利。

jx.jx_en_mean: in an unfavourable position relative to someone or someone else

lj.lj_ly: stringent regulations have &B{put} British farmers &B{at a disadvantage}.
lj.lj_ls: 严格的规定使得英国的农民处于不利地位。

jx.jx_en_mean: so as to cause harm to one's interests or standing

lj.lj_ly: his poor educational track record inevitably worked to his disadvantage.
lj.lj_ls: 他很差的学习成绩记录肯定会对他不利。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French desavantage, from des- (expressing reversal) + avantage 'advantage'

entry.tran: 不利条件;劣势;不便之处
entry.def: A disadvantage is a factor which makes someone or something less useful, acceptable, or successful than other people or things.

example.ex: His two main rivals suffer the disadvantage of having been long-term political exiles...
example.tran: 他的两个主要竞争对手因长期政治流亡而处于不利的地位。

example.ex: ...the advantages and disadvantages of allowing priests to marry.
example.tran: 允许神父结婚的利与弊

entry.def: If you are at a disadvantage, you have a problem or difficulty that many other people do not have, which makes it harder for you to be successful.

example.ex: The children from poor families were at a distinct disadvantage...
example.tran: 来自贫困家庭的孩子们处于明显的不利地位。

example.ex: England's players would be left at a disadvantage against those of the rest of the world.
example.tran: 英格兰运动员与世界其他地区的运动员相比将处于不利境地。

entry.def: If something is to your disadvantage or works to your disadvantage, it creates difficulties for you.

example.ex: A snap election would be to their disadvantage...
example.tran: 提前选举将对他们不利。

example.ex: Depression is the third thing that works to my patients' disadvantage.
example.tran: 抑郁是威胁我的病人健康的第三大杀手。

means.word_mean: 1. the quality of having an inferior or less favorable position
1. put at a disadvantage; hinder, harm;

auth_sentence.content: One disadvantage with this setup is the asset bar.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"分开,分离,去掉"; 2. 表示"否定,不,消失掉"

stems_affixes.word_buile: dis否定,不,消失掉+graceful优美的→adj.可耻的, 不名誉的
dis否定,不,消失掉+honest诚实的→adj.不诚实的
dis否定,不,消失掉+incline愿意→adj.不愿的
dis否定,不,消失掉+passionate有激情的→adj.平心静气的
dis否定,不,消失掉+solute溶解→溶解开来→没有限制→放荡的
dis否定,不,消失掉+son声音+ant……的→声音不[好听]
dis分开,分离,去掉+cern搞清,确定+ment表名词→确定不同之处→有眼光

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不利, 不利条件, 缺点, 劣势
stems_affixes.word_buile: dis否定,不,消失掉+advantage优点,有利条件→n.不利, 不利条件, 缺点, 劣势
dis不+gust美味→n. 厌恶,恶心 v. 使厌恶
dis否定,不,消失掉+honour尊敬→毫无尊敬→丢脸
dis否定,不,消失掉+may能→不能做事→沮丧;参考:五月能种粮食,所以叫May
dis否定,不,消失掉+order顺序→没有顺序
dis否定,不,消失掉+proof证实→不证实→反证
dis分开,分离,去掉+course课程,教程→分解课程→论述→论文
dis分开+play=ply重叠→打开折叠→显示出来
dis分开,分离,去掉+affect感情→感情分开→疏远
dis分开,分离,去掉+burse钱包→从钱包中分出→支出
dis分开,分离,去掉+crimin分辨→ate→分辩开
dis分开,分离,去掉+cuss敲打→把[问题]分开敲→讨论
dis分开,分离,去掉+miss送→分开送出→解散
dis分开,分离,去掉+part部分→分成部分→分开
dis分开,分离,去掉+pens花费+e→分开花费→分配[财富等]
dis分开,分离,去掉+semin种子+ate表动词→散布[种子]
dis分开,分离,去掉+tend伸展,拉→分开伸展→膨胀
dis分开,分离,去掉+tract拉→把[心]拉开→分心
dis不+adapt使适应→v.使不适应
dis否定,不,消失掉+appear出现→不出现→消失
dis否定,不,消失掉+arm武装→去掉武装
dis否定,不,消失掉+courage勇气→v.使失去勇气
dis否定,不,消失掉+cover盖→把盖揭开→发现
dis不+gust美味→n. 厌恶,恶心 v. 使厌恶
dis否定,不,消失掉+honour尊敬→毫无尊敬→丢脸
dis否定,不,消失掉+like喜爱→不喜爱
dis否定,不,消失掉+organize组织→解散组织
dis否定,不,消失掉+pel推→推开→驱除

Sentence.sentence: refers to the disadvantages of being married.
I don't think there are any disadvantages.

means.word_mean: 不利因素；障碍；不便之处

sentences.en: We were put at a serious disadvantage.
sentences.cn: 我们被置于非常不利的地位。

jushi.english: The work has the disadvantage of being written in tedious style.
jushi.chinese: 那部作品有冗长乏味之弊。

jushi.english: His bad health is a great disadvantage to him.
jushi.chinese: 身体不好对他极为不利。

jushi.english: The machine has two serious disadvantages.
jushi.chinese: 那台机器有两个严重缺陷。
